content:
/>
II.iii.4.B.2.b
.
Uploaded Personalized Signature Page Method
A personalized signature page download is available to POAs during the VDC interview process in SEP.
The personalized signature page contains
the claimant’s name
the claims file number, and
Section V: Claim Certification and Signature from
VA Form 21-526EZ
.
Upon completion, the
VA Form 21-526EZ
and personalized signature page are uploaded into VBMS.  The personalized signature page will appear in VBMS with the document type label
Signature page VDC submitted 21-526EZ
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section B - Stakeholder Enterprise Portal (SEP) Claims
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section B
